          <title>
            <string language="en">Light travels in a straight line  flashlight setup</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist in eine gerade Geraden Taschenlampe 
Installation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lumière voyage dans une ligne droite 
installation de lampe-torche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja em uma linha reta instalação da 
lanterna elétrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce viaggia in una linea retta messa a punto 
della pila</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια σε μια οργάνωση φακών ευθειών 
γραμμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja en una línea recta disposición de 
la linterna</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing that light travels in a straight line. This illustration shows the light rays from the flashlight.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pencil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">straight line</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, die 
zeigen, daß Licht in eine gerade Geraden reist. Diese Abbildung
zeigt die hellen Strahlen von der Taschenlampe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations prouvant que
la lumière voyage dans une ligne droite. Cette illustration 
montre les rayons légers de la lampe-torche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram que 
a luz viaja em uma linha reta. Esta ilustração mostra os raios
claros da lanterna elétrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che indicano
che la luce viaggia in una linea retta. Questa illustrazione 
mostra i raggi luminosi dalla pila.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι ελαφριά 
ταξίδια σε μια ευθεία γραμμή. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει 
ελαφριές ακτίνες από το φακό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran que la luz viaja en una línea recta. Esta ilustración
muestra los rayos ligeros de la linterna.</string>
          </description>
